# deallocate()

**Instance Method**

Deallocates the previously allocated memory block referenced by this pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
func deallocate()
```

## Discussion

The memory to be deallocated must be uninitialized or initialized to a trivial type.
title: deallocate()
